page.title: 01A General View
page.content: Most of this block is made up of farming land with part of Milborne Port and a small part of Henstridge. There is also the small village of Purse Caundle. The area is quite flat compared with the rest of the area,there are no major hills. There are large pockets of woodland i this block mainly deciduous trees. There are also some very rare orchids growing in secret places in the woods The A30 runs through the block taking traffic to Shaftesbury and Yeovil.In the summer the road gets very busy with holiday makers going to the West Country resorts.There is also a lot o industrial traffic using the road. Most of the people in this block use the facilities of Milborne Port for shopping and recreation.
